dashboard.intro: Get the website you need for your business. We specialize in providing solutions for small and medium-sized businesses.
dashboard.explain1: We offer price ranges tailored to the complexity of your project. From basic pages to advanced solutions.
dashboard.explain2: By registering, you can consult directly with our developers to define the details of your project and track its progress.

services.staticDescription: Simple pages, ideal for small businesses without a database.
services.simpleDescription: Includes features like contact forms and storage.
services.complexDescription: Advanced features and customized complex databases.

introduction.title: Welcome to My Client and Project Management Web Application
introduction.description: This is a web page designed to facilitate collaboration between clients and developers in the development of web projects. The application offers specific functionalities depending on the type of user.
clientFeatures: Project Management: Manage web page projects, track progress, and check the current status.
Integrated Chat: Direct communication with the developer.
Meeting Planning: Tool to coordinate activities with the developer.
Real-time Tracking: View updates on the project.
programmerFeatures: Client Management: Manage a list of clients and their projects.
Integrated Chat: Smooth communication with clients.
Notifications: A system to stay updated on important events.
technologies: Frontend: React 18, React Hooks, Tailwind CSS, i18n.
Tools: Nodemon, Docker, and Docker Compose.
introduction.importantInfoDescription: To test the application, you can use the following test users. Here are the test user details:
introduction.adminUser: The admin test user is: username: admin, password: password
introduction.clientUser: The client test user is: username: user@gmail.com, password: password
introduction.createUser: You can also create a client user if you'd like. The test users come with pre-filled data for testing purposes.
introduction.showIntroRemind: -> You can access this information at any time by clicking the button in the navBar (it is hidden in light mode)
